column2: "Na eso enuanom
column3: yɛma hom ehu Nyankopɔn adom a ɔdze adom Masidonia asɔrasɔr:"

column2: "mbrɛ hɔn ahohia nsɔhwɛ kɛse mu hɔn dɛw mbordo nye hɔn hia dodow no buu do kyerɛɛ hɔn ayamuyie ahonya."
"Na midzi hɔn ho dase dɛ wɔmaa dɛ mbrɛ wobotum
column4: a ofi hɔnara hɔn pɛ mu
column6: "na wɔtotɔe serɛɛ pii dɛ wobenya kyɛfa wɔ hɔn som a wɔdze som ahotseweefo no wɔ adɔyɛ ho;"

column2: "na nnyɛ dɛ iyi yɛ biribi a hɛn enyi daa do a
column3: na mbom wɔnam Nyankopɔn ne pɛ do dzii kan dze hɔnankasa hɔnho maa Ewuradze
column4: na afei wɔdze hɔnho maa hɛn so."

column2: "Na iyi ntsi yɛserɛɛ Titus dɛ
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔhyɛɛ ase kan no
column4: onwie adɔyɛ yi dɛmara wɔ hom so mu."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ hom bor do wɔ adze nyina mu no
column7: nye hom dɔ a ɔwɔ hɛn do no
column8: hom nhwɛ dɛ hom bɔbor do wɔ adom yi so mu."

column2: "Na mennka yi wɔ nhyɛ do
column3: na mbom medze binom mbɔdzembɔ rosɔ hom dɔ no nokwar ahwɛ."

column2: "Na hom nyim hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest n'adom
column5: ama hom nam ne hia do aayɛ ahonyafo."

column2: "Na m'adwen na mekyerɛ wɔ iyi mu
column6: hom dzii kan hyɛɛ ase mfeda."

column2: "Na afei hom nwie ne nyɛɛ no so
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hom ayɛ krado wɔ ɔpɛ mu

column2: "Na sɛ ɔpɛ mu dze obi yɛ krado a
column3: enyisɔ wɔ mu dɛ mbrɛ obi wɔ
column4: na nnyɛ mbrɛ onnyi bi a."

column2: "Na mennka yi ama binom ho aadwe hɔn
column3: na hom dze hom ho eeguan hom
column5: "na dɛ ɔnyɛ pɛpɛɛpɛr ntsi a; ama dɛm ber yi mu hom mbordo no aakɔhwɛ hɔn hia
column6: na hɔn so hɔn mbordo aabɔhwɛ hom hia

column2: "dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw dɛ
column3: Onyia ɔtasee pii ennya ma aammbor no do

column2: "Na ndaase nka Nyankopɔn a ɔdze hom ho mbɔdzembɔ kor yi ara ahyɛ Titus n'akoma mu."
"Na otsiee hɛn afotu dze
column3: naaso noara no mbɔdzembɔ kyɛn dɛm ntsi
column4: ɔnam nankasa ne pɛ do baa hom nkyɛn."

column2: "Na yɛsomaa ɔno nye onua no a ne nkamfo wɔ asɛmpa no mu atahye wɔ asɔr nyina mu no;"
"na nnyɛ dɛm nko
column3: ɔno na asɔrmba no eyi no dɛ ɔnye hɛn nnantsew wɔ adɔyɛ yi a yɛrosom ho yi mfa nkyerɛ Ewuradze n'enyimnyam nye hɛnara so hɛn mbɔdzembɔ kɛse no:"

column2: "na yɛda hɛnho do amma obi eennya hɛn ho asɛm bi wɔ adze dodow a yɛrosom ho yi ho:"
"na yɛdwen dza ɔyɛ enyidzi ho sie
"Na yɛasoma hɛn nua a yeenya no nhunii dɛ ɔbɔ mbɔdzen wɔ ndzɛmba pii mu
column3: na afei osian awerɛhyɛmu kɛse a oenya no hom mu ntsi

column2: "Titus ho a
column3: ɔyɛ me nyɛnko nye me nyɛnko dwumadzifo ma hom; hɛn nuanom ho a

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom nyi hom dɔ nye ahohyehyɛ a yɛhyehyɛ hɛnho wɔ hom ho ne dasee nkyerɛ hɔn wɔ asɔrasɔr enyim."
